name: Liberti
description:
Liberti has been developped with an "automatic" thought process, where no global plan was made and every new segment was created "on the spot" without requiring any structural or chronological coherence. 

The user explores the bright and colorful world(s) while aiming towards a never quite reachable sense of total liberty.

Controls :

Move around -> W, A, S, D
Move camera -> Mouse directional
Mute sound -> M
Show menu -> ESC 

Recommended minimum specs for ultra quality settings and 1920 x 1080 resolution :

High-end i5/i7 CPU
3GB GPU
